summary: Take on the quest of solving riddles and collecting Rare Toy
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=3]The High Elf dolls of the famous Valenwood toymaker Irna Jullalian,has been located somewhere in Skyrim.
The shady merchant appears in Dragon's Bridge and has the written locations of all seven dolls.
There is just one catch,the locations are written in riddles.Solve the riddles and get the collection.

Start the quest by going to Dragon's Bridge and buying the eight riddles from shady merchant.
The Dolls look great together,and if you do not like them you can sell them from a high price.[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]The Locations :
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][spoiler] Fort Dawnguard [/spoiler]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][spoiler] Shadowgreen Cavern [/spoiler]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][spoiler] Hogh Hrotghar [/spoiler]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][spoiler] Wolfskull Cave [/spoiler]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][spoiler] Cancelmo's Lab [/spoiler]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][spoiler] Ysolda's House [/spoiler]
[spoiler] Palace Of Kings,Wizard Quarters [/spoiler][/size][/font]


[i]Credits :
Oaristys for Clutter
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/14336449?tab=user+files]LeftTounge[/url]Â for riddles[/i]
